  • Class
    Description
    ArgumentTypes
    Vanilla Minecraft includes several custom ArgumentTypes that are recognized by the client.
    AxisSet
    A set of Axis intended for use in CommandContext.getArgument(String, Class) instead of a raw Set.
    CustomArgumentType<T,N>
    An argument type that wraps around a native-to-vanilla argument type.
    CustomArgumentType.Converted<T,N>
    An argument type that wraps around a native-to-vanilla argument type.

    Utilities for extracting registry-related arguments from a CommandContext.
